timeline.bodyText:
There is no point in calling an Event when it gets cancelled anyway.
The whole point of the Event contract is that others get a say in the outcome of the Event, not that their changes get overridden otherwise.
If no block gets placed, then there shouldn't even be an Event called.

replies.bodyText:
You cannot just make only the event calling conditional. The check must occur far before any Event is even called, so better before these methods are even invoked in the first place.
Also, you should really test your changes before-hand.
